fields.description: Number of the purchase lot as defined on the bidding

fields.description: Description of the purchase lot as defined on the bidding

fields.description: Item number as defined on the bidding

fields.description: Item code as defined on the basic materials catalog

fields.name: itemDescription
fields.title: Descrição do Item
fields.description: Item description as defined on the bidding

fields.name: itemMeasureUnit
fields.title: Unidade de Medida
fields.description: Item measure unit

fields.name: itemQuant
fields.title: Quantidade
fields.description: Purchase quantitie as defined on the bidding

fields.title: Preço Unitário
fields.description: Item unit price as defined on the bidding

fields.name: itemBrand
fields.title: Marca
fields.description: Item brand as defined on the bidding

fields.description: Manager responsable for the contracting

fields.description: Abbreviation of the agency relating to the SGPE process opened for the Price Registration Minutes

fields.description: Year of registration of the SGPE process opened for the Price Registration Minutes

fields.title: Representante do Fornecedor
fields.description: supplier representant responsible for the relationship with the State in the purchase of materials

fields.title: CPF do Representante
fields.description: CPF number of the supplier's representative

fields.name: numPublicDoe
fields.title: Nº da Publicação no DOE
fields.description: Number of the Official State Diary in which the Price Registration Minutes were published

fields.name: datePublicDoe
fields.title: Data de Publicação no DOE
fields.description: Date on which the Price Registration Minute was published in the Official State Diary
